# NFCNDEFStatus.readOnly

**Case**

A status indicating that the tag supports reading NDEF message data only.

## Declaration

```swift
case readOnly
```

## Statuses

- **NFCNDEFStatus.notSupported**: A status indicating that that tag isn’t an NDEF-formatted tag.
- **NFCNDEFStatus.readWrite**: A status indicating that the tag supports reading and writing NDEF message data.
